name: places/ChIJQ1cUVOv3wokRzKlMKM3NNRo
formattedAddress: 215 W 94th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 215 W 94th St, New York, NY 10025, USA

editorialSummary.text: Relaxed rooms in an unassuming Upper West Side hotel offering an exercise room & Wi-Fi.

originalText.text: A four star review is well deserved for what this hotel is. Do NOT expect a nice, fancy amenity-filled hotel. This is a clean, quiet place to sleep that meets your budget. Let's face it, you found this place because the price is lower than where you really want to stay. We live near the city, but planned to have a quick overnight and did not want to spend on a nicer hotel. PROS: very friendly staff, 2 bottled waters in the room, simple snacks given upon check in, Manhattan Diner (EXCELLENT) offers a 10% discount for stays at this hotel, quiet rooms (city noise was not heard at all), CLEAN sheets, nice pillows, CLEAN towels. Clean floors. This place is older- we were on the 10th floor and it looks cruddy- dirty walls, old carpet, and peeling wallpaper. BUT NO ODORS, NO BUGS. This place is like staying at an old relatives place. The bed was nice enough for 1-2 nights for sure. Our shower was NOT great, but not decidedly the worst I have had. I slept well and was able to shower. The fact that there was no odor and the sheets and towels were sparkling white and felt fresh, tells me they have excellent staff who make do with very old material. The front desk staff was very courteous and I really enjoyed the evening front desk clerk who checked us in. I would likely consider this for a single night use again. Value with a great location. Direct access to metro.

originalText.text: Don't let the pictures keep you away from this hidden gem.  The hotel is being renovated.  Our room was like new.  Beautifully decorated and the best bed that I have slept in months while being on vacation and staying at expensive hotels.  Everything was ready for our stay.  Check-in took less than 5 minutes.  They had all the information.  When we got to our room we were really happy.  Everything was beautiful, clean, and spacious room. All staff encountered were nice and friendly.  The only con is that the walls are thin, and we were able to hear our neighbors' party next door.  Besides that, no complaints. The hotel is near everything. Restaurants, shops, and the train station.

originalText.text:
Great and modest place, good and simple service.
The rooms are easy to find, the rooms are clean and give you many towels and small sanitary items.
Great location too, right next to a few food places and right next to a subway.
The rooms are a little small though, and so are the restrooms.

originalText.text: I don’t understand all the bad reviews..yes it is very outdated but we found the room very clean, good room service every day and the shower was immediately hot with no particular problem (beside being very old). Staff was available and helpful when needed. Location is perfect!! Walking distance from Central Park and just a few stop away from the center of Manhattan! It’s honestly better than it looks like :)

text.text: I don’t understand all the bad reviews..yes it is very outdated but we found the room very clean, good room service every day and the shower was immediately hot with no particular problem (beside being very old). It’s honestly better than it looks like :)

originalText.text: Horrible experience. Booked a room here because they had the lowest price (around $600 total for two nights!!!) for an okayish room, or so I thought. Stayed there for 2 nights. First night the heater wasn’t working. Thankfully they got it fixed for night two. Bed was dirty, carpet had stains especially in the corners which looked like mold. The bathroom was full of rust. I didn’t even feel comfortable taking a shower but according to my husband water took 15 minutes to heat up. Oh towels had stains too! The corridors smell like cigarettes. Never book this hotel! The only good part of this hotel was it’s location and being next to the subway - but there is a limit to how much you can up charge for the location.
